sourcesContent: import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import Head from 'next/Head' import { Button, Divider, Grid, makeStyles, Typography, } from '@material-ui/core' import { usePagesContext } from '../src/contexts/PagesContext' import Link from '../src/Link' import PageHeader from '../src/ui/PageHeader' import { useLanguageContext } from '../src/contexts/LangContext' const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ img: { width: '100%', }, })) const Services = props => { const classes = useStyles() const { setPageIndecies } = usePagesContext() useEffect(() => { setPageIndecies('/services') }, []) const { siteData } = useLanguageContext() return ( VR events for families, companies and conferences | VRFunTeam {siteData.services.private.title} {siteData.services.private.text} {siteData.services.company.title} {siteData.services.company.text} {siteData.services.events.title} {siteData.services.events.text} ) } export default Services
